column1: PARTNER_ID VARCHAR(50) -- (PARTNER_ID) ID of the partner
LOAN_ID VARCHAR(50) -- (LOAN_ID) ID of the loadn
STATUS VARCHAR(50) -- (STATUS) Status of the loan. Either "Performing" or "Non performing"
SEGMENT VARCHAR(50) -- (SEGMENT) Segment of the client business
SIZE NUMERIC -- (SIZE) The size of tje client in MEUR
column2: usually this is the client's turnover

column1: MATURITY NUMERIC -- (MATURITY) Maturity of the load
F_MORTGAGE CHAR(1)  -- (F_MORTGAGE) If 'Y' the loan is a mortgage
F_REVOLVING CHAR(1) -- (F_REVOLVING) If 'Y' the loan is revolving
F_LARGE_FIN CHAR(1) -- (F_LARGE_FIN) If 'Y' the client is large financial institution
